reviewtext: This is a good enough surge protector. GIven how much Monster knows about multi media setups, I wish they had spaced out the sockets a bit more. I seem to have a lot of fat headed plugs (adapters for hand drives, cable modem etc) that really crowd out the sockets. There is a lot of real estate on the unit, so I dont know why Monster did not space the sockets out.
summary: Socket spacing could have been better
